meanings.definition: To reach the maximum level or limit.
meanings.sent1: She was maxing out her speed on the treadmill.
meanings.sent2: He is always maxing his potential in every task he takes on.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was maxing its acorn collection skills.
meanings.sent4: The sun was maxing its brightness in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The river was maxing its flow after the heavy rain.

meanings.definition: The act of maximizing or reaching the highest point.
meanings.sent1: Her constant maxing of effort led to great success.
meanings.sent2: The team's maxing of their skills impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's maxing of its nap time was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's maxing of its height was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The flower's maxing of its bloom was a sight to behold.
